long_description: alison leigh and paul miller purchased the pub in march 2012 and today it is a shining example of a thriving traditional freehouse community pub. we know and value our customers, we know how to store and deliver beers. it's a relaxing place to sit with friends. we have won camra pub of the year 2013 and burnley's best pub 2014, a great achievement. walkers and cyclists welcome, camra.
